original_text: But the son of Paul's sister heard what the Jews had decided to do. He went into the soldiers' building and he told Paul about it.
korean_text: 바울의 생질이 그들이 매복하여 있다 함을 듣고 와서 영내에 들어가 바울에게 알린지라

sentences.original_text: But the son of Paul's sister heard
what the Jews had decided to do
He went into the soldiers' building
and he told Paul about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 바울에게 그것에 대해 말했습니다
